resources.string: Deliveree is a full service on-demand transportation and logistics provider at the tip of your fingers. Use our mobile app to book and manage pickups and deliveries of anything and let our drivers handle the rest.
The app matches a demand with a driver in about a minuteand provides customer with the driverâ€™s contact details and ETA topickup location.

Responsibilities:
 - Designed and implemented the user interfaces (UI).
 - Performed Unit Tests.
 - Specified and performed Feature Deliverables Test plans.
 - Used: Java, Android Studio 2.3.3, Google API, AWS service, Firebase service, Twilio service, Crashlytic, Freshdesk, Volley, Flurry Analytics, MoEngage, Sqlite and SharedPreferences.

Programming Duration: 2.5 years 
8 hours coding/testing/maintenance per day

This is a news app read clearly summarized. We have some categories as entertainment news, technical seasonality love, diet, cosmetics, beauty, corde, fashion, music, emotion.Post your favorite You can also share with friends via Facebook, Line, Twitter or copy url to clipboard and send it via Email, SMS, ....

Play 13 drum pads with 19+ ealistic drum sounds. Instruments like kick, bass, snare, tom, floor, cymbal, hi-hat, ride, crash, splash, bell, china, stack, block, cowbell and tambourine. Record mode. Play in loop. Works with all screen resolutions - Cell Phones and Tablets (HD Images)
The application allows you to view information of the financial companies in Japan. Advice from lending money, providing computational tools interest, payable monthly.
The application enables viewing news in the horse races in Japan. Users can view the rate, location, time of race inspection.
The application lets you search and link together through the search criteria to match those of the opposite sex to meet and then proceed to marriage.

Programming Duration: 1.5 years 
8 hours coding/testing/maintenance per day

Hello, I'm Quoc Nghiep Nguyen. I am a hardworking, proficient IT professional with 1 year of web development experience and 4 years mobile development experience and real passion for developing mobile applications. Ready to embrace advanced technology. Having helped develop apps in Android. Summary of experience: 

 -Four years professional experience in software engineering as Android development using Android Studio.
 - Expertise in developing Internet Applications with Web Services (json,xml).
 - Hands on experience in Android SDK based application development. - Familiar with Android APIs.
 - Strong ability to perform complex analysis, design and development .
 - High level ability to support operational and production systems.
